short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A climbing grade converter for bouldering

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Climbing grades have always been a source of confusion and mystery, but fear no more with the Climbing grade converter the arcane runes are now easy to decipher and convert. This extension should serve as a quick and easy way to convert between different climbing grade systems so you know what sick grades your friend on the other side of the globe are crushing.
